name: The Cave VR
description: The Cave is a 2 in 1 VR bundle. An arcade game and a real world fear experience. Play the arcade option and hunt for diamonds over a dangerous plank while big oscillating logs try to hit you and make you fall down or live the fear of being trapped in a deep cave. A VR game/experience that won't disappoint you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 960 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForceâ„¢ GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 750 MB available space
